attributes.action: resign and call for an immediate general election.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We the undersigned hold Gordon Brown responsible for the disasterous policies which have placed this country in serious financial difficulties and consider his continued stewardship will inflict further financial difficulties. This is a vote of no confidence in Brown and the Labour Government.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
